name: PowAR
description:
PowAR an augmented reality & Hand tracking game for Android smartphones. ("WIP")

A gateway to other world appears in your place. Once you open the doors of other world by pressing the button with your index finger using ManoMotion Hand tracking, enemies will attack on you. You have to save your self and our world using PowARs.      

Instructions to play:

  • Use a solid color surface for better tracking and best experience.
  • Use your hands to interact with game. 
  • Scan the horizontal surface and tap on screen to place portal door.
  • Using your Index finger press the button to open the door.
  • To kill enemies use Click gesture .
  • Levitate the Crystals using Swipe Up and Down gestures.
